support_article_can_i_install_a_local_co: Can I Install a Local Copy of JustDo?
Can I Install a Local Copy of JustDo? | JustDo Support
Yes, you can install a local copy of JustDo. Learn about the SaaS and standalone options for using JustDo on your own infrastructure.
Yes, you can install a local copy of JustDo. It can be used in two ways:
As a SaaS application, where we host the server and manage all IT issues.
As a standalone version on a private cloud or on-premise behind your firewall. Contact us at info@justdo.com for more information.
